item.title: Advice for junior project saboteurs
item.description: Over the years I have developed a passion for seeing software projects fail. I love the feeling of breakdown and despair they cause everyone involved in them. Failed projects break teams, make companies loose money, disappoint clients and burn out the people involved in them. They have a beautiful destructive potential. If you love how to sabotage projects but don’t know how, don’t worry, I’m here to help. I’m going to walk you trough some of the techniques and methods I’ve developed over the years to sabotage my own projects.
